nodes.text: The Copper Coast, as it was known, was the eastern edge of the Meirm Sea, located on the planet of Sriluur. Its name came from the copper particles present in its sand which, when combined with the fog from the Meirm Sea, created a corrosion-green film in nearby Meirm City.
The Boneglass Canyon connected its northern edge with the city of Dnalvec, twenty five kilometers away.
